languages.text: Корабль архимагоса Амарната лежит в руинах. Необходимо выяснить, что на нем произошло и кто послал сообщение, приведшее Вольного Торговца и Паскаля Ханейманна на борт.

Archmagos Amarnat's ship is in ruins. The Rogue Trader and Pasqal Haneumann will have to investigate the events that caused this state and discover the identity of whoever sent the message that brought them here.
languages.original_text: Корабль архимагоса Амарната лежит в руинах. Необходимо выяснить, что на нем произошло и кто послал сообщение, приведшее Вольного Торговца и Паскаля Ханейманна на борт.

Archmagos Amarnat's ship is in ruins. The Rogue Trader and Pasqal Haneumann will have to investigate the events that caused this state and discover the identity of whoever sent the message that brought them here.

languages.text: Le vaisseau de l'archimagos Amarnat est en ruines. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} et Pasqal Haneumann vont devoir enquêter sur les événements à l'origine de la destruction et découvrir l'identité de la personne qui a envoyé le message les invitant à venir ici.
languages.original_text: Archmagos Amarnat's ship is in ruins. The Rogue Trader and Pasqal Haneumann will have to investigate the events that caused this state and discover the identity of whoever sent the message that brought them here.

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau de l'archimagos Amarnat est en ruines. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} et Pasqal Haneumann vont devoir enquêter sur les événements à l'origine de la destruction et découvrir l'identité de la personne qui a envoyé le message les invitant à venir ici.

languages.text: 阿玛纳特大贤者的舰船已经化为了残骸。行商浪人与帕斯卡·哈努曼必须弄清楚这艘舰船究竟发生了什么事情，以及究竟是什么人把他们引到了这里。
languages.original_text: Archmagos Amarnat's ship is in ruins. The Rogue Trader and Pasqal Haneumann will have to investigate the events that caused this state and discover the identity of whoever sent the message that brought them here.

traits.locale_text: 阿玛纳特大贤者的舰船已经化为了残骸。行商浪人与帕斯卡·哈努曼必须弄清楚这艘舰船究竟发生了什么事情，以及究竟是什么人把他们引到了这里。

languages.text: 大賢人アマルナトの船は壊滅状態だ。自由開拓者とパスカル・ヘニュマンはこのような状態の原因となった出来事を調査し、自分たちをここまで呼び出したメッセージの送り主の正体を突き止めなければならない。
languages.original_text: Archmagos Amarnat's ship is in ruins. The Rogue Trader and Pasqal Haneumann will have to investigate the events that caused this state and discover the identity of whoever sent the message that brought them here.

traits.locale_text: 大賢人アマルナトの船は壊滅状態だ。自由開拓者とパスカル・ヘニュマンはこのような状態の原因となった出来事を調査し、自分たちをここまで呼び出したメッセージの送り主の正体を突き止めなければならない。

languages.text: Das Schiff von Erzmagos Amarnat ist zerstört. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} und Pasqal Haneumann müssen die Ereignisse untersuchen, die dazu geführt haben. Und sie müssen herausfinden, von wem die Nachricht stammt, die sie hergeführt hat.
languages.original_text: Archmagos Amarnat's ship is in ruins. The Rogue Trader and Pasqal Haneumann will have to investigate the events that caused this state and discover the identity of whoever sent the message that brought them here.

traits.locale_text: Das Schiff von Erzmagos Amarnat ist zerstört. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} und Pasqal Haneumann müssen die Ereignisse untersuchen, die dazu geführt haben. Und sie müssen herausfinden, von wem die Nachricht stammt, die sie hergeführt hat.

languages.text: La nave del Archimagos Amarnat está en ruinas. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente y Pasqal Haneumann deberán investigar los sucesos que han causado este estado y descubrir la identidad del responsable del mensaje que les ha traído aquí.
languages.original_text: Archmagos Amarnat's ship is in ruins. The Rogue Trader and Pasqal Haneumann will have to investigate the events that caused this state and discover the identity of whoever sent the message that brought them here.

traits.locale_text: La nave del Archimagos Amarnat está en ruinas. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente y Pasqal Haneumann deberán investigar los sucesos que han causado este estado y descubrir la identidad del responsable del mensaje que les ha traído aquí.

languages.text: Başmagos Amarnat'ın gemisi harap hâlde. Hür Tacir ve Pasqal Haneumann, geminin bu duruma gelmesine sebep olan olayları araştırıp onları buraya yönlendiren mesajı gönderenin kimliğini bulmalı.
languages.original_text: Archmagos Amarnat's ship is in ruins. The Rogue Trader and Pasqal Haneumann will have to investigate the events that caused this state and discover the identity of whoever sent the message that brought them here.
